summary: Rebrand to “QUICK-D” appears applied in key surfaced UI places (index.html title, Splash/Auth/Home header, OutOfRadius message) and logo references shown in the diff are updated to `/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png` with `alt="QUICK-D"` on logo images. However, the diff summary does not show the new logo asset being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and it’s not possible from the provided diff summary to confirm project-wide removal of all user-facing “Quick-Delvery” occurrences or that every instance of the old logo path was replaced everywhere.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new combined QUICK-D logo image file to the frontend static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename `quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png`, and ensure it’s loaded as a direct static asset path.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows many code references to `/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png`, but the diff summary does not show an added file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with that exact filename (image/binary assets are not present in the shown added/modified file list).

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current logo used in the app UI with the new combined QUICK-D logo, updating all places that currently render "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png" to use the new asset.

evidence: Modified files show new path but do not show global replacement/removal of `/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png` across the codebase (only partial file set shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed shopping cart UI behavior beyond branding (new `CartItem` component with quantity controls/remove; cart page now includes coupon input and pricing summary sections).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is strictly rebranding text/logo; it explicitly lists changing app functionality as a non-goal. The diff introduces/rewires cart UI components and flows unrelated to branding.

frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx (imports and uses CouponInput, PricingSummary; new layout/behavior)
